category: Obsolete Substances Herbs that Dispel Wind-Dampness

action.primary: Dispels Wind-Dampness, unblocks the channels and collaterals and stops pain

indications: Wind-Damp Bi, numbness in the limbs, difficulty moving the joints and paralysis
General pain, including digestive and trauma induced

contraindications: Over dosage can led to nausea, vomiting, epigastric pain, anorexia, dizziness, headache, anxiety and a dry throat.
Contraindicated for those with Internal Heat due to Yin Deficiency.

useCases: Bloating and pain in the epigastrium with anorexia and acid regurgitation.

notes: This herb can be used alone as a decoction or tincture for Wind-Dampness.
It can be used as a decoction or plaster for trauma.
This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
The whole plant is soaked in water and taken, for muscle, bone and Stomach pain.
It is also used to treat Damp-Heat.
It is primarily used for bone and Lung cancers.
